title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 380 - Prevent and Control of Environmental Pollution by Radioactive Materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 380 - Prevent and Control of Environmental Pollution by Radioactive Materials

State Regulations

Subpart 380-1 - General Provisions (§ 380-1.1 to 380-1.6)

Subpart 380-2 - Definitions (§ 380-2.1 to 380-2.3)

Subpart 380-3 - Permits (§ 380-3.1 to 380-3.6)

Subpart 380-4 - Waste Disposal (§ 380-4.1 to 380-4.4)

Subpart 380-5 - Radiation Dose Limits For Individual Members Of The Public (§ 380-5.1 to 380-5.2)

Subpart 380-6 - Surveys and Calibrations (§ 380-6.1 to 380-6.2)

Subpart 380-7 - Release Minimization Programs (§ 380-7.1 to 380-7.3)

Subpart 380-8 - Records (§ 380-8.1 to 380-8.7)

Subpart 380-9 - Reports (§ 380-9.1 to 380-9.3)

Subpart 380-10 - General Regulatory Requirements (§ 380-10.1 to 380-10.9)

Subpart 380-11 - Annual Limits on Intake (ALI) and Derived Air Concentrations (DAC) Of Radionuclides For Occupational Exposure; Effluent Concentrations; Concentrations For Release To Sewerage (§ 380-11.1 to 380-11.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 380

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, arts. 1, 3, 17, 19, 27, 29, 37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
